result.execSummary:
The defendant Harry Thomas Canady Jr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC AMENDED FROM Possess w/Intent-THC (<=200 grams), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Possession of THC AMENDED FROM Possess w/Intent-THC (<=200 grams)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Harry Thomas Canady Jr

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Per RASO - mandatory jail time has been served

Defendant Harry Thomas Canady in court with attorney Erin Joy Larsen.  Defendant Harry Thomas Canady in custody.  Bridget D. Brave appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Rose Coulthart.
State moves to amend Ct. 1 to Misd PTHC.
Plea:  Ct. 1 - G.
BTC:  Ct. 1 - GUILTY.  Cts. 2&3 - DRI.
CFTS;
CC+DNA surcharge - provide sample.
Expungement in 1 year with no new arrests.

Final pre-trial at 02-15-2016 08:30 am.
Jury trial at 02-24-2016 08:30 am.

Defendant Harry Thomas Canady in court with attorney Erin Joy Larsen.  Defendant Harry Thomas Canady in custody.  Bridget D. Brave appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Rose Coulthart.
Matter was set for PLEAH.  Defense req speedy trial.
BTC:  All motions to be filed within 10 days.

  Jury trial scheduled for February 24, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Final pre-trial scheduled for February 15, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:    Defendant to be placed on GPS monitor through Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI), 524 Main Street, 3rd floor, (262-632-1780).Exceptions are going to court and meeting w/his Atty. It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.  AMENDED 12/8/15:  GPS removed.  Defendant taken into custody

Defendant Harry Thomas Canady in court with attorney Erin Joy Larsen.  Bridget D. Brave appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Rose Coulthart.  compliance with bond is questioned.  Cash bond set $4,000C same conditions except GPS is not going to be needed  taken into custody  Plea hearing scheduled for January 4, 2016 at 09:00 am.
Status conference scheduled for December 8, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Harry Thomas Canady in court with attorney Jamie Mccledon for Atty Erin Joy Larsen.  Bridget D. Brave appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Mark Garvin.  Waiver of Preliminary hearing filed.  Probable cause found;  bound over.
Defense requests bond modification. 
BTC: Bond modification is granted. Bond conditions are modified to allow Defendant to attend school. All other conditions remain.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 9, 2015 at 08:15 am.

Defendant Harry Thomas Canady in court.  Bridget D. Brave appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Mark Garvin.
Defendant needs to go the SPDO to obtain counsel. 
BTC: Matter is adjourned for Defendant to obtain counsel.  Status conference scheduled for September 9, 2015 at 08:30 am.
